mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_no goodsNo , b.orders_no ordersNo , c.customer_mail customerMail , b.board_content boardContent , b.create_date createDate FROM board b JOIN orders o ON b.orders_no = o.orders_no JOIN goods g ON o.goods_no = g.goods_no JOIN payment p ON o.payment_no = p.payment_no JOIN address a ON p.address_no = a.address_no JOIN customer c ON c.customer_mail = a.customer_mail WHERE g.goods_no = ${goodsNo} ORDER BY b.create_date DESC
SELECT count(*) cnt , orders_no ordersNo , board_content boardContent FROM board WHERE orders_no = #{ordersNo}
